content: {"name": "Atlantic Community Charter School District", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Summer Meal Program\nCoordinator: Lauren\tMurray\t6097481250\nStarts: 07/07/2025 ends:\t08/07/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "112 South New York Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Oceanville", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.4816341, "longitude": -74.45853699999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 748-1250", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
